privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.content: We respect the privacy of our customers, partners, suppliers of products or services, and clients. The purpose of this Privacy Policy is to provide you with information about how we collect personal information when you use this Web site; how we collect other information about your interactions with this Web site without identifying you as an individual; how we use, process, and disclose the information we collect; and your choices about how the information information about your choices regarding how the information is collected and used.

ga4-migration.title: The eCommerce experience analytics solution that will help you simplify your Google Analytics 4 migrationThe eCommerce experience analytics solution that will help you simplify your Google Analytics 4 migration
ga4-migration.description: If you are here, it is because you are feeling under pressure with the sunset of Universal Analytics in July 2023.This Google Analytics 4 migration might be overwhelming, but Air360 can help.Watch our quick video that explains how you can solve your challenges in this migration.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.desc: Fully compliant with GDPR & CCPA privacy acts

security.title: Security
security.desc: Your data is safe, secure, and always available​

card1.title: Privacy by default
card1.desc: Air360 automatically disallows the capture of any sensitive or personal data that a user enters in an input field of your web store

card2.title: Right to erasure
card2.desc: GDPR requires you to be able to delete a given user and all its related data. Air360 offers a function that will allow you to delete a specific user and related sessions with just a single click.

card3.title: Right to object
card3.desc: Air360 enables you to go further by also hiding explicitly parts of your pages from being recorded during session replays

card4.title: Right of access & data portability
card4.desc: You can retrieve specific user details simply by going through our application or using our API

card1.title: Monitoring of our Tracking pixel
card1.desc: Constantly conducted to detect any malicious modification and ensure its delivery, integrity and safety

card2.title: State-of-the-art encryption
card2.desc: Used in all Air360 products for data in transit and at rest

card3.title: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
card3.desc: Required for all our users to access to Air360 application adding an extra layer of security and keeping your accounts safe

card4.title: Third-party security audits
card4.desc: Conducted regularly and before major releases, including penetration tests and vulnerability scans

card5.title: Security best practices
card5.desc: Reviewed by third party companies regularly when important updates are performed on our systems

card6.title: Customer data processed & stored in the EU
card6.desc: Air360 core systems are hosted on OVHcloud and Amazon Web Services (AWS) servers located in France and Ireland and leverage all the security and compliance provided by OVHcloud/AWS: ISO (9001, 27001, 27017, and 27018), SOC 1, 2, and 3, PCI DSS
